title: Abroad. Journal of a tour through Great Britain and on the Continent
author: Coghill, James Henry.
snippet: 9th, Sunday.—Attended services at the Dublin Street BaptistChurch in the morning, and heard a good sermon from Matthewxxvi:29, by the pastor, a very old man ; communion after the closeof the services. On making inquiry, I learned from one of themembers that strangers were not permitted to commune unlessthey had letters from the church to which they belonged, and aswe had none, we did not remain.
